overview: This hilarious one-man comedy, written and performed by the versatile and talented James Arrington, introduces you to all the famous and funny "cousins" who come to a mythical family reunion. Giggle, snicker, chortle, cackle, chuckle, guffaw and split a gut over the Farleys. It's a "laugh-a-minute entertainment that is so delightful it's almost lethal."
title: The Farley Family Reunion
